prompt:
Extract contents related to the topics Mitigation, Alleviation, Reduction, Minimization, Therapy, Intervention, Remediation, Healing, Treatment, Cure, Remedy in Gaucher Disease using the only Input.
Do not include your assumption.
response: Elelyso™ is a treatment for Gaucher's disease. It is a therapeutic protein produced by plants. This protein is known as β-glucocerebrosidase. It is used in enzyme replacement therapy. The plant-derived β-glucocerebrosidase has terminal mannose residues. These residues are crucial for the success of the therapy.
